result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ERIK W VANHAASTER

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 29, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for ERIK W VANHAASTER
Current: 220 Washington St, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 11-03-2022)
Prior: 4311 Jackson St, C/O Winnebago County Jail, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States
Pretrial Status Report
to Bond Poster (Surety)

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.              (posted in Winnebago 8/29/22)
Return date on November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:38 AM Defendant ERIK W VANHAASTER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ERIK W VANHAASTER. Def has no objection to holding this hearing by zoom. Atty Kapelis states defendant will waive prelim. Def concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. OFF THE RECORD AT 10:40 AM 

COURT RECALLS 10:43 AM. Parties remain the same. Def confirms he's waiving the right to a prelim. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court. Attorney  Kapelis acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading and confirms it mirrors the criminal complaint. Atty Kapelis enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court will set for Return Date November 7, 2022 at 10:30 AM. 

Atty Kapelis requests bond modification and states reasons. Court denies motion to modify bond.


Court adjourned at 10:46 AM.
Defendant's
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant ERIK W VANHAASTER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ERIK W VANHAASTER. Atty Kapelis states they are requesting a preliminary hearing. Court sets for Preliminary Hearing on August 16, 2022 at 10:30 AM via zoom.

Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on July 19, 2022 at 11:30 am. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely

Confirmed with Winnebago Co. Jail and instructions emailed on today's date.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant ERIK W VANHAASTER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ERIK W VANHAASTER. Atty Kapelis has not been able to talk with the defendant re: prelim. Court sets for Status of Prelim in July 19, 2022 at 11:30 AM
(Atty Michael Kapelis)
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on June 21, 2022 at 11:00 am. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to Winnebago Co Jail)

ADDRESS INFO for ERIK W VANHAASTER
Current: 4311 Jackson St, C/O Winnebago County Jail, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 05-20-2022)
Prior: 220 Washington St, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States
Warrant has been canceled - talked with Sam in Dispatch.
Warrant has been canceled - talked with Sam in Dispatch.

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

4:00 PM Defendant ERIK W VANHAASTER appeared by video, in custody.  Atty Michael Kapelis appears for the defendant. Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2021CF136 & 2022CF72. Defendant has no objection to holding this hearing via zoom. Court goes over right to appear in court or a break-out room. 2021CF136 - Atty Kapelis recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 with probation and conditions and count 2 will be dismissed and read-in. DA concurs. Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant. Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights. Court goes over the elements of each offense. Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty. Court instructs defendant regarding deportation. (If felony) Court instructs regarding felony prohibitions. 

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST. Court finds the plea is made knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently. Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea. Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged and orders count 2 be dismissed and read-in. Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today. Sentencing statement by DA. Sentencing statement by Atty Kapelis. Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-SWD, and places the defendant on probation for 3 years.

CONDITIONS:

-Court costs. To be paid to the Clerk of Courts office.  Monies are to be paid during the term of probation.  Failure to pay may result in the suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency. 
-AODA and any follow-up, unless recently completed one. 
-Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. 
-Defendant is to abide by all rules and recommendations of the supervising agent including any counseling and/or treatment and follow-up as recommended. 
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample. 

2022CF72 (Initial Appearance)

Atty Kapelis has not received a copy of the criminal complaint. Court reads complaint to the defendant. Atty Kapelis now confirms receipt of the criminal complaint, waives reading and requests a preliminary hearing. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 cash bond signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. You may be randomly tested for compliance. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Prelim on June 21, 2022 at 11:00 AM

Court adjourned at 4:15 PM
Sent to GLSO on April 28, 2022.

9:44 AM Defendant ERIK W VANHAASTER appeared by phone.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is not here in person due to transportation issues. DA requests bench warrant. Court states if the def can get here before 4:00 PM today this case will be address or else a warrant will be issued for the defendant.

Court adjourned at 9:46 AM.

ADDRESS INFO for ERIK W VANHAASTER
Current: 220 Washington St, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 04-26-2022)
Prior: 303 N Main St, Fairwater, WI 53931

Defendant called to say he will not make court this morning as he has transportation issues and requests to appear via zoom. Defendant will call back for zoom info when he has a pen available. Def called back and was given zoom information. Def's address was updated.
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
